trans-unit.source: Provides a specialized <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSource"></xref> that is optimized for loading images using [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xaml](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-xaml-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: 提供的特定<xref href="System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSource"></xref>而最佳化的映像使用[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xaml](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-xaml-md.md)]。

trans-unit.source: BitmapImage primarily exists to support [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xaml](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-xaml-md.md)] syntax and introduces additional properties for bitmap loading that are not defined by <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSource>.
trans-unit.target: BitmapImage 主要是為了支援存在[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xaml](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-xaml-md.md)]語法與點陣圖載入的是未定義<xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSource>。</xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapSource>導入額外的屬性

trans-unit.source: BitmapImage implements the <xref:System.ComponentModel.ISupportInitialize> interface to optimize initialization on multiple properties.
trans-unit.target: BitmapImage 實作<xref:System.ComponentModel.ISupportInitialize>最佳化初始化多個屬性上的介面。</xref:System.ComponentModel.ISupportInitialize>

trans-unit.source: Property changes can only occur during object initialization.
trans-unit.target: 在物件初始化期間只能發生在屬性變更。

trans-unit.source: Call <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapImage.BeginInit%2A> to signal that initialization has begun and <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapImage.EndInit%2A> to signal that initialization has completed.
trans-unit.target: 呼叫<xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapImage.BeginInit%2A>發出信號，初始設定開始和<xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapImage.EndInit%2A>來表示已完成初始化。</xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapImage.EndInit%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapImage.BeginInit%2A>

trans-unit.source: After initialization, property changes are ignored.
trans-unit.target: 在初始化之後，屬性變更都會被忽略。

trans-unit.source: BitmapImage objects created using the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapImage.%23ctor%2A> constructor are automatically initialized and property changes are ignored.
trans-unit.target: 使用建立的 BitmapImage 物件<xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapImage.%23ctor%2A>建構函式會自動初始化，而且屬性變更會被忽略。</xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapImage.%23ctor%2A>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapImage"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapImage"></xref>類別。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapImage> implements the <xref:System.ComponentModel.ISupportInitialize> interface to optimize initialization on multiple properties.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapImage>實作<xref:System.ComponentModel.ISupportInitialize>最佳化初始化多個屬性上的介面。</xref:System.ComponentModel.ISupportInitialize></xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapImage>

trans-unit.source: To initialize a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapImage> created using this constructor, you must perform property initialization between <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapImage.BeginInit%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapImage.EndInit%2A> calls.
trans-unit.target: 初始化<xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapImage>使用這個建構函式所建立，您必須執行之間的屬性初始化<xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapImage.BeginInit%2A>和<xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapImage.EndInit%2A>呼叫。</xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapImage.EndInit%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapImage.BeginInit%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapImage>

trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapImage"></xref>藉由提供<xref:System.Uri>.</xref:System.Uri>類別

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapImage> objects created using this constructor are automatically initialized.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapImage>使用這個建構函式建立的物件會自動初始化。</xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapImage>

trans-unit.source: After initialization, property changes are ignored.
trans-unit.target: 在初始化之後，屬性變更都會被忽略。

trans-unit.target: The uriSource parameter is .

trans-unit.target: 所指定的檔案 uriSource 找不到參數。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapImage"></xref> class with an image whose source is a <xref:System.Uri>, and is cached according to the provided <xref href="System.Net.Cache.RequestCachePolicy"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapImage"></xref>類別與映像的來源是<xref:System.Uri>，並會快取根據提供<xref href="System.Net.Cache.RequestCachePolicy"> </xref>。</xref:System.Uri>

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapImage> objects created using this constructor are automatically initialized.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapImage>使用這個建構函式建立的物件會自動初始化。</xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapImage>

trans-unit.source: After initialization, property changes are ignored.
trans-unit.target: 在初始化之後，屬性變更都會被忽略。

trans-unit.source: BitmapImage is introduced in the .NET Framework version 3.5.
trans-unit.target: BitmapImage.NET Framework 3.5 版中引進。

trans-unit.target: 取得或設定<xref href="System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapCacheOption"></xref>要用於此執行個體<xref href="System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapImage"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Set the CacheOption to <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapCacheOption?displayProperty=fullName> if you wish to close a stream used to create the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapImage>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapCacheOption?displayProperty=fullName>如果您想要關閉用來建立<xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapImage>.</xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapImage>資料流</xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapCacheOption?displayProperty=fullName>時，設 CacheOption

trans-unit.source: The default <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapCacheOption> cache option retains access to the stream until the image is needed, and cleanup is handled by the garbage collector.
trans-unit.target: 預設值<xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapCacheOption>快取選項會保留存取的資料流，直到所需的映像及清理工作由記憶體回收行程。</xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapCacheOption>

trans-unit.source: When copying dependency properties, this method copies resource references and data bindings (they might no longer resolve) but not animations or their current values.
trans-unit.target: 當複製相依性屬性時，這個方法會複製資源參考和資料繫結 （它們可能不能再解析），但不是動畫或它們目前的值。

trans-unit.target: 目前物件的可修改複本。

trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 即將加入。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the height, in pixels, that the image is decoded to.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定以像素影像解碼成的高度。

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapImage.DecodePixelWidth%2A> is also set, the aspect ratio of the bitmap is ignored.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapImage.DecodePixelWidth%2A>也已經設定，則會忽略點陣圖的長寬比。</xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapImage.DecodePixelWidth%2A>

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapImage.DecodePixelWidth%2A> is not set, the aspect ratio remains the same.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapImage.DecodePixelWidth%2A>未設定，外觀比例將保持不變。</xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapImage.DecodePixelWidth%2A>

trans-unit.source: The [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_jpeg](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-jpeg-md.md)] and [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_png](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-png-md.md)] codecs natively decode the image to the specified size; other codecs decode the image at its original size and scale the image to the desired size.
trans-unit.target: [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_jpeg](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-jpeg-md.md)]和[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_png](~/add/includes/tlasharptla-png-md.md)]轉碼器原生將影像解碼成指定的大小; 其他轉碼器解碼其原始大小的影像，並調整所需大小的影像。

trans-unit.source: The height, in pixels, that the image is decoded to.
trans-unit.target: 高度 （以像素影像解碼成）。

trans-unit.source: The default value is 0.
trans-unit.target: 預設值為 0。

trans-unit.source: -or- The EndInit method is called without first calling <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapImage.BeginInit*>.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapImage"></xref> is downloading content; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果<xref href="System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapImage"></xref>是下載內容，否則<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Not supported.
trans-unit.target: 不支援。

trans-unit.source: An attempt to read the Metadata occurs.
trans-unit.target: 嘗試讀取中繼資料，就會發生。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the angle that this <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapImage"></xref> is rotated to.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定角度這<xref href="System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapImage"></xref>旋轉至。

trans-unit.source: Rotation is performed after scaling.
trans-unit.target: 旋轉後調整執行。

trans-unit.source: This means that an image that has a Rotation of <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.Rotation>, a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapImage.DecodePixelWidth%2A> of 10, and <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapImage.DecodePixelHeight%2A> of 5 will result in an image that has a width of 5 and a height of 10.
trans-unit.target: 這表示，具有的旋轉的映像<xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.Rotation>、<xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapImage.DecodePixelWidth%2A>為 10，和<xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapImage.DecodePixelHeight%2A>為 5 會導致影像的寬度為 5，10 的高度。</xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapImage.DecodePixelHeight%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapImage.DecodePixelWidth%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.Rotation>

trans-unit.target: # # 相依性屬性資訊 | | | |-|-| |識別項欄位 || |中繼資料屬性設定為`true`|None |

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the stream source of the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapImage"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定資料流來源的<xref href="System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapImage"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: If StreamSource and <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapImage.UriSource%2A> are both set, the StreamSource value is ignored.
trans-unit.target: 如果 StreamSource 和<xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapImage.UriSource%2A>同時設定，則會忽略值 StreamSource。</xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapImage.UriSource%2A>

trans-unit.source: Set the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapImage.CacheOption%2A> property to <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapCacheOption?displayProperty=fullName> if you wish to close the stream after the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapImage> is created.
trans-unit.target: 設定<xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapImage.CacheOption%2A>屬性<xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapCacheOption?displayProperty=fullName>如果您想要關閉的資料流之後<xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapImage>建立。</xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapImage> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapCacheOption?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapImage.CacheOption%2A>

trans-unit.source: The default <xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapCacheOption> cache option retains access to the stream until the bitmap is needed, and cleanup is handled by the garbage collector.
trans-unit.target: 預設值<xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapCacheOption>快取選項會保留存取的資料流，直到所需的點陣圖，並清除由記憶體回收行程。</xref:System.Windows.Media.Imaging.BitmapCacheOption>

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a value that represents the caching policy for images that come from an HTTP source.

trans-unit.source: UriCachePolicy is introduced in the .NET Framework version 3.5.
